items.name: ORG_Code_Selector
items.label: كد سازمان داخلي
items.sql:
SELECT ORG_Code
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE ORG_Type = '@#ORG_Type'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code = '@#ORG_L4_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L5_Code = '@#ORG_L5_Code_Select'
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_Name
items.label: نام سازمان داخلي
items.sql:
SELECT ORG_Name
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE ORG_Type = '@#ORG_Type'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code = '@#ORG_L4_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L5_Code = '@#ORG_L5_Code_Select'
 and IsActive = 1

options.label: كد 501 تا 700 ||  كار گروه‌ها و كميته‌ها

items.name: ORG_Type_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ORG_Master_Code, 'سازمان را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_Master_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_Master_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Type = '@#ORG_Type'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L1_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب زير واحد سطح يك
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L1_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L1_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L1_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L2_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب زير واحد سطح دو
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L2_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L2_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L2_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L3_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب زير واحد سطح سه
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L3_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L3_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L3_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L4_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب زير واحد سطح چهار
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L4_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L4_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L4_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: ORG_L5_Code_Select
items.label: انتخاب واحد سازماني سطح پنج
items.sql:
SELECT 0 ORG_L5_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L5_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L5_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code = '@#ORG_L4_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L5_Code <> 0
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: Ext_ORG_Code_Selector
items.label: كد سازمان خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT ORG_Master_Code
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE ID = '@#Ext_Org_Type'
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: Ext_ORG_Name
items.label: نام سازمان خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT ORG_Name
FROM PMT_TB100009
WHERE ID = '@#Ext_Org_Type'
 and IsActive = 1

items.name: Ext_Org_Type
items.label: انتخاب نوع سازمان خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'نوع سازمان را انتخاب كنيد' ID

UNION

SELECT ID, concat(ORG_Master_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = 'X'
and IsActive = 1

items.name: Post_ID
items.label: رديف حوزه سازماني / تخصص
items.hint: بايستي يك رديف پست سازماني / تخصص انتخاب شود ...
items.sql:
SELECT ID, concat(Post_Code," || ",Post_Title)
FROM PMT_TB100012 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID' and ORG_Code = '@#ORG_Code'  and IsActive = 1 or Ext_Int_ID = 'A'
ORDER BY Post_Code

items.name: Post_Code
items.label: كد حوزه سازماني / تخصص
items.sql:
SELECT Post_Code
FROM PMT_TB100012 
WHERE ID = '@#Post_ID'
 and Post_Code <> '9999'

items.name: Post_Title
items.label: عنوان حوزه سازماني / تخصص
items.sql:
SELECT Post_Title
FROM PMT_TB100012 
WHERE ID = '@#Post_ID'
 and Post_Code <> '9999'

items.name: Post_Code_Counter
items.label: شمارنده حوزه سازماني
items.sql:
SELECT count(ID)
FROM PMT_TB100012 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID'
 and Ext_Int_ID <> 'A'
 and ORG_Code = '@#ORG_Code'

items.name: Job_Ranks_Code_Selector
items.label: رديف رتبه شغلي / ديسيپلين
items.hint: بايستي يك رديف رتبه شغلي/ديسيپلين انتخاب شود
items.sql:
SELECT Job_Ranks_Code, concat(Job_Ranks_Code," || ",Job_Ranks_Title)
FROM PMT_TB100011 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID' or Ext_Int_ID = 'A'
ORDER BY Job_Ranks_Code

items.name: Job_Ranks_Title
items.label: عنوان رتبه شغلي / ديسيپلين
items.sql:
SELECT Job_Ranks_Title
FROM PMT_TB100011 
WHERE Job_Ranks_Code = '@#Job_Ranks_Code_Selector' and Job_Ranks_Code <> '99'

items.name: Job_Ranks_Counter
items.label: شمارنده رتبه شغلي
items.sql:
SELECT count(ID)
FROM PMT_TB100011 
WHERE Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID' 
 and Ext_Int_ID <> 'A'

variables.var_accepted_values: [{"value":"","label":"نوع سازمان را انتخاب كنيد"},{"value":"M","label":"كد 001 تا 100 || مديريت"},{"value":"D","label":"كد 101 تا 400 || واحدها"},{"value":"C","label":"كد 501 تا 700 ||  كار گروه‌ها و كميته‌ها"},{"value":"P","label":"كد 701 تا 999 || پروژه‌ها"}]

variables.var_sql:
SELECT NULL ORG_Master_Code, 'سازمان را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_Master_Code

UNION

(SELECT ORG_Master_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Type = '@#ORG_Type' 
 and ORG_L1_Code = 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
order by ORG_Code)

SELECT NULL ORG_L1_Code, 'زير واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L1_Code

UNION

(SELECT ORG_L1_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE  ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L2_Code = 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
order by ORG_Code desc)

SELECT NULL ORG_L2_Code, 'زير واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L2_Code

UNION

(SELECT ORG_L2_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE  ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L3_Code = 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
order by ORG_Code desc)

SELECT NULL ORG_L3_Code, 'زير واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L3_Code

UNION

(SELECT ORG_L3_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE  ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L4_Code = 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
order by ORG_Code desc)

SELECT NULL ORG_L4_Code, 'زير واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L4_Code

UNION

(SELECT ORG_L4_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE  ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code <> 0
 and ORG_L5_Code = 0
 and IsActive = 1
order by ORG_Code desc)

SELECT 0 ORG_L5_Code, 'واحد را انتخاب كنيد' ORG_L5_Code

UNION

SELECT ORG_L5_Code, concat(ORG_Code," || ",ORG_Name)
FROM PMT_TB100009 
WHERE ORG_Master_Code = '@#ORG_Type_Select'
 and Ext_Int_ID = 'N'
 and ORG_L1_Code = '@#ORG_L1_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L2_Code = '@#ORG_L2_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L3_Code = '@#ORG_L3_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L4_Code = '@#ORG_L4_Code_Select'
 and ORG_L5_Code <> 0
 and IsActive = 1
